title: non pixel pano to pixel 4a stereoscope image
content:
I just discovered that Panos taken on pixel 4a can be viewed as a stereoscope image on the Google Box...I tried viewing other panos not taken on pixel but the option for stereoscope doesn't avail iteslf..

Question, can i take a pano shot on another non pixel device and convert it to be able to see it in stereoscopic mode with the Google Box?  

Any ideas welcome in advance.

Thanks
